r.d: ev provides interface to libev library - high performance full-featured event loop written in C.
r.n: Fix: segmentation fault in EvLoop/EvWatcher dtors caused by reference variables stored in 'data' property Fix: EvLoop/EvWatcher object dtors sometimes didn't free the 'data' member until the script shutdown phase Fix: get_properties property handler was not implemented for PHP >= 5.4.0
